item.title: Andrew Stockdale
item.description: Andrew James Stockdale is an Australian rock musician, singer and songwriter best known as the lead vocalist, lead guitarist and only continuous member of the rock band Wolfmother, which formed in 2004. In 2007, he won 'Songwriter of the Year' at the APRA Awards along with his bandmates. Aside from his work with Wolfmother, Stockdale was featured on the 2010 single 'By the Sword' by Slash, and released a solo album in 2013, Keep Moving.
